name: Belleview Park

This review is short and sweet! What more can you say about a park then...relaxing and fun! Mom and Dad relaxing while the kids play in the...

name: Punch Bowl Social Stapleton
reviews:
I feel lame leaving a 5 star review for a 3-1/2 star place. I need to be bolder and stop liking everything. 

I actually don't see why the hate. Like what...

Been back only a few times since my initial (5 star) review. The food is delicious, but the only thing  that might kill this place is the service. 

1) The...

name: Bad Axe Throwing

name: Banjo Billy's Bus Tours
reviews: I've done two banjo billy bus tours - the ghost tour and the Denver history tour. Both were an absolute blast and so well done. The guide we had yesterday...

I loved this tour, would have given 5 stars if the bus had real windows that could be lowered for picture taking. 
The guide was entertaining and made...

I had a lot of reservations before getting on the bus. Was it going to be long enough? Would it be too short? Was the tour guide going to be annoying? 

But...

name: Historic Downtown Golden
reviews: This town is quite cute. Unfortunately, it was raining when we visited so we couldn't fully experience the place. From what we saw it was awesome with many...

An awesome little downtown for an afternoon stroll with all the obligatory tourist shops; candy stores, tee-shirt shops, restaurants, bars.... Something for...

name: Great Divide Brewing Company
reviews: Great downtown brewery. Stopped in for a couple drinks while i was down in Denver for a conference. If you are an IPA drinker, I highly recommend their...
Came here after the baseball game and the only downside was that they closed at 10 pm, which didn't give us a lot of time to really take our time sampling...
Been to Great Divide a few times and have never really tried anything since they didn't tend to have sours. It was my lucky day because they had 2 to choose...

name: Four Mile Historic Park
reviews: This review was for their pumpkin festival.  Free admission but have to pay for food, rides and activities.  We parked for free at a parking garage down the...
We went on a weekday in late August. Literally everything was closed, and there were signs everywhere not to touch ANYTHING. Why not just close? It's pretty...
Summer Concerts at Four Mile Historic Park are marvelous. I saw "Take Down the Door", an Irish group and had a wonderful time: outdoor picnic dinner, grassy...

name: The DIA Giant Blue Bronco
reviews: I love the fact that Blucifer greets all you new arrivals to Denver with a scowl and laser eyes. You have to love a work of art that killed its creator.

This statue is a really cool sight while driving to/from the airport! Especially when it is lit up at night. 

Our Uber driver told us the "legend" of the...
Denver is a very artist friendly city. No matter what part of the city you are in there will likely be some form of art. Be it a painting, a mural, a...

name: Fiske Planetarium
reviews:
This place is really awesome. I went to see the android jones exhibit here and it was so cool!

I would come Back and recommend this place to a friend :)
Soooo cool! The EDM events are awesome. I wish they were just a little earlier but a good event for cheap and something different. Definitely check it out...
Came here for a David Bowie Light show on a Friday night. I read reviews about how it looks like a 90s screensaver, and yes sometimes it really did remind...

name: Mt. Sanitas Trail
reviews: Have hiked this a few times.  It's a nice amount of exercise.  Took me about an hour to get from the bottom of the trail at about 5500 feet of elevation to...
This is one of my fav hikes with my GSP, and I was surprised to see some people complaining about off leash dogs.  Boulder has online maps showing where...

The climb up the trail is beautiful right now!  Everything is green and the wildflowers are blooming.  It took about an hour to the top with a
few photo...

name: The Clue Room
reviews: My family and I had a blast here! We had researched several options in the area and this was by far the best price and best experience! We called ahead of...

I had a blast! I had never tried a clue or escape room, but it's all about keeping an open and curious mind and encouraging your team. 

The event took an...

name: Puzzah!

Puzzah is a Bonafide room escape in downtown Denver! This is a review for Kazam!

The location is easy to find and has a large waiting lobby. We had to...

name: Bookbar
reviews: Superb bookstore that serves food and beverages. There are times book clubs meet and the seating areas are reserved. We went midday on a Sunday and were...
I was sold from the table of contents alone. Is it a book store? Is it a bar? The little gem off Tennyson somehow finds a melancholy balance of both,...
Anytime I hear books and coffee I'm automatically in. My daughter and I got a chance to finally check this place out and we loved it! She loved the variety...

name: 16th Street Mall
reviews: This is a great strip of museums, art work, shops and restaurants. Buses navigate up and down the strip, so that if you do not want to walk, you can catch...
Liked this area of Denver, happened to be staying here for a couple of days. Pedestrian friendly and lots of restaurant choices. Parking appears to be a...
Fun restaurants, museums, cafes, coffee shops, and more.  Worth the walk down the mile and so many options for how you want to spend your time in Denver!  I...

name: The Infinite Monkey Theorem
reviews:
I think I like this place. Super cute wine bar with not many choices but definitely a good selection of wines. 
If you're a beer aficionados they have a...

the wine is amazing, not a lot of options but thats because everything they serve is made there!

the vibe is amazing. we went during winter and the inside...

name: Film on the Rocks
reviews: Film on the Rocks is def one of my FAVORITE summer happenings! A local band (sometimes even a comedy act) and a movie in the best outdoor venue for a mere...

name: Peter Pan Park
reviews: This park was built in 2010 as "Westminster Center Park" and nicknamed "Peter Pan Park" by locals. The play area surprises with a London theme, complete...
Great park! Clean, lots of benches and different play structures, will definitely be back!
Cool park! The official name is Westminster Center Park. I love that there are no rocks, sand, wood chips, etc. for kids to toss around and mess the place...

name: Nightly Spirits
reviews: I had the most fun and interesting experience on my first haunted pub crawl tour! Our tour guide Joaquin was incredibly knowledgeable of the history of...
My wife and I enjoy traveling and participating in Ghost Tours when available. Our host was very passionate and you can tell that he absolutely loved the...

I was searching for things to do while we were on our beerymoon in Denver and lo and behold, I stumbled across this gem!

We knew we were in for a treat...

name: 88 Drive In Theatre

PRICE
+ It's...

name: United States Mint
reviews:
I'm a history dork so this place was up my alley. Great to learn about America's currency, past and present. 

They have weird hours and tour times....

Since it was free, I can't really complain.  

We showed up at 11:15 to get tickets for the 3:30 tour, which was no problem.  It was a cloudy Tuesday in...
So I read all the reviews and arrived at 6:30am. I was completely alone! So I think the lines are an issue in the summer. On 12/10 with 40 degree temps,...

name: Water World
reviews: I came to Colorado for a wedding but I always make sure to make some time for a waterpark or theme park. I decided on this place because I heard so many...
Your typical Water World experience happens here. Lots of rides and slides to choose from and most are worth the wait. However, take note that most lines...

I took my children to Water World on September 2. 
While swimming in the wave pool my son and I were pulled out to far. The lifeguards  were not watching...

name: Sloan's Lake Park
reviews: I agree with some of the others...do NOT, I repeat, do NOT use the restrooms.  I have never seen a women's restroom so disgusting.  No TP was the least of...

Really good to walk/run around or bike or skate... whatever your mode of transportation may be at the time, yes the park is great for this reason! 

The...

name: Royal Arch
reviews: what a gorgeous hike!! we truly enjoyed the view. it was a Wonderful trail! Steep and a little icy. Plenty of parking for a Saturday afternoon.  We go there...

Basically just a heads up we...

name: Monster Mini Golf
reviews: I bought a groupon to check this place out and stopped in with my 9 yr old on Sunday afternoon. The staff was super friendly. We got right in started our...

name: Puzzle Effect - Denver
reviews: WOW! Puzzle Effect (Formerly Denver Escape Room) is a WONDERFUL place to do escape rooms. I am a veteran. After the first time, I was hooked and couldn't...

name: Cherry Creek Arts Festival
reviews: Dealing with difficulty things in life can take over in ones spiritual mind. That's why the art festival in Cherry Creek shopping center can certainly...

A little warm today but still a great time. Awesome art, food vendors and restaurants (slinging terrific food and beverages) and the the crowd couldn't be...

name: Mile High Adventure Rentals
reviews: Absolutely loved today! We rented snowmobiles. Rented for a half day and boy was it cold! Come prepared! It was 4*. (We rode up close to steamboat springs)...
These guys where awesome!! I rented a atv for our weekend trip. All their equipment was newer and you can tell they take the time to keep their ATVs safe....
We had the most awesome day riding moto in the mountains thanks to these guys.  They went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed.  Their...

name: Dangerous Theatre
reviews: This is a hidden gem! What a great venue for a small intimate crowd and such a welcoming host. She invited us in cheerfully and made a delicious breakfast....
Last night we went to see "Adulting Sucks". I didn't really know what to expect but definitely thought it would be funny. It was not really "funny" though...
We were welcomed and offered snacks and pot( oh you said pop) There was a good variety of choices both of cold or hot drinks and chips, crackers or cookies...

name: Museum of Contemporary Art Denver
reviews: Three floors of gallery space in a unique floor plan that allows room for wall space, open areas and interesting vistas - interior and gazing out into...

name: EscapeWorks Denver
reviews:
Had a great time and Savannah was a great game master! Would recommend again. 

I am continuing to write this review because Yelp won't let me leave a short...
The Outbreak and Casino Heist rooms were solid and solvable, but the staff did not monitor their games the way game masters at every other escape room we've...
What a terrific time at EscapeWorks. Emilia, Taylor and the rest of the team set up a great Christmas Story Escape Room with a lot of fun puzzles to solve....

name: Clear Creek Whitewater Park
reviews: I found this place my first trip to Denver. It is only a few minutes from downtown Denver and even less from west side suburbs. I can not add much to what...
A beautiful section of Clear Creek runs right thru downtown Golden and is a great place for whitewater (very tame rapids) rafting or just floating on a...
We went tubing in late June of 2019. Water levels and snow fall in Colorado are at a 20 year high, so we were cautious. Make sure you check the flow rates...

name: Centennial Center Park
reviews: Centennial did a great job with this park. There's plenty of space here with a giant playground and even a splash pad going in the summer. My favorite part...
This is the flagship playground for the South metro area and boasts the largest sprayground in town, a huge climbing net, a stage for events, and a young...
This place probably has the best splash area around. Gets busy quickly. The playground is enormous. Great place for parties. They have events here all...

name: Canvas and Cocktails
reviews:
SO. MUCH. FUN! 

I came here because of mine asked me to join her and her mom. I'm so thankful I did! I loved the entire atmosphere, and vibes of this...

You can paint whatever you like. Of course, there's the guided tour of the...

Had a fantastic time on 1st date here. I had no idea what to expect.

name: Boulder Farmers' Market

name: Class Axe Throwing

name: The Colorado Sightseer

name: Urban Air Adventure Park - Littleton
reviews: So my friend and I both came here to check it out after we had finished up with our errands and it was overall a decent place. We are both adults and it...

name: Mile High Flea Market
reviews: Great place to bring the kids. Sit inside the Chicken coop, eat chicken wings and drink beer while your kids ride rides, shop, and buy fresh farm produce...

Trash trash don't come here don't waste your time, gas and money the worst "flea market" I've ever been. 

Este lugar es simplemente basura, no gastes tu...

name: Uncorked Kitchen & Wine Bar
reviews: I've been to two classes now - knife skills with Chef Logan and vegetarian winter classics with Chef Ian. Both classes were wonderful. The knife skills...

This has been on my list to take a cooking class (which I love to do), but just never got there.  However, for my birthday my hubby treated me to a wine...

name: Lower Maxwell Falls Trail Head
reviews:
I'm going to let you in

A little hard to find
Search the web for it
Small parking lot
But the walk to th3...

name: Adventure Golf and Raceway
reviews:
We came here on a whim ... we passed this place once and were in the mood to go mini golf so decided to give this place a go.

This place has a really cool...

We went on opening weekend March 7-8, 2020 and the place was terrible. Nothing was set-up or ready to go. Out of the three admission windows available only...

name: Cherry Creek Trail
reviews: Terrific trail in the heart of downtown Denver. The trail is clean and safe, with separate sides for bikes & runners vs pedestrians only. There are lots of...
Fun trail to walk around, I love taking the doggos here. They always have a blast with other dogs and the water. I wish denver would send some police to get...
This bike trail was so busy and full of homeless like others have wrote about . . It's a flat trail that you can go for a long time but it's dangerous with...

name: Bear Mountain Stables
reviews: We did a 1h ride with our 9yo daughter. This was an awesome stable and experience. They made sure we got a quick orientation and safety overview which I...
Awesome stable and ride. Marie and Uta were caring, responsive and patient. The beautiful horses were gentle and well cared for.  The trail was more...
I treated myself for a horseback ride for my birthday in May and had such a fantastic time. The owner was extremely kind and made me feel extremely...

name: Cheesman Park
reviews: Look no further for an urban park in Denver. Surrounds with trees, buildings, downtown and mountain views. The park is centrally located is the...
Cheesman is my favorite Denver park. I'm prejudiced--if I go down the staircase behind my townhouse and open the gate, I'm standing in the park and just...
Cheesman Park is so convenient to where I like to stay when I am visiting Denver. The park has lots of energy with people walking, twirling fire batons,...

name: Delicious Denver Food Tours
reviews: We did the Food Tour with Jill this past weekend and had some great food!  Jill was super friendly, threw in interesting facts about the city, and showed us...

Great afternoon on a Denver Food Tour with our guide, Bonnie!  We enjoyed 6 foodie locations in the LoDo area of downtown Denver and this proved to be a fun...

name: Maize in the City
reviews: This is a really great event - First of all, you can come check it out for free.  By free, I mean that you can get in to check everything out at no cost....
Great for little kids and wide selection of pumpkins.  Several bounce houses and a fun play area.
We didn't actually try the maize here. I know! But we had a great time. All of the employees were friendly, and this is a good choice for families with...

name: SeaQuest Littleton
reviews:
Wow! This place is surprisingly awesome!!!

It looks like a small, fun, quirky kids' aquarium. It's so much more! We got free admission with the GetOut pass...
This was fabulous, we 5 all enjoyed seeing the sting ray best and getting to touch them. I suggest one enter on the right where it is Not dark and gradually...

In a mall, miles from our house. This place was so fun and I had a blast!  

I got to go with a girlfriend and her two little ones, it was very clean and...

name: Family Shooting Center at Cherry Creek State Park
reviews: Honestly, I've been to a pretty wide variety of public shooting ranges before and they've been anywhere from well run and safe to downright scary. This one...
They do not provide a good training environment. You are unable to stand and shoot a rifle or shoot from the prone position.  They get upset you "fire too...
I absolutely love this shooting center for multiple reasons. 1. If you are a novice they will take the time to teach you correct posture- grip-aim-load &...

name: Golden Puzzle Room
reviews:
The husband and I went on our own to try out the Zephyr. This is my 5th escape room experience and ranked among one of my favorites. 

Pros: This is one of...
